title: Relates to the number of city court judges in the city of Saratoga Springs; repealer
summary: Relates to the number of city court judges in the city of Saratoga Springs.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1626

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. TEDISCO -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act,  in  relation  to  the  city
         court  judges  of  the  city of Saratoga Springs and to repeal certain
         provisions of the judiciary law relating thereto

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  51  of  subdivision (d) of section 2104 of the
    2  uniform city court act, as amended by chapter 493 of the laws  of  2006,
    3  is amended to read as follows:
    4     51     Saratoga Springs, [one] TWO full-time [and one part-time];
    5    S  2. The ninety-third unnumbered clause of section 221-i of the judi-
    6  ciary law, as amended by chapter 493 of the laws of 2006, is REPEALED.
    7    S 3. Transition. Upon the effective date of this act, the position  of
    8  part-time  judge  of  the Saratoga Springs city court shall be abolished
    9  and be replaced by a full-time judgeship.  Any  person  serving  in  the
   10  position abolished hereby on the date of its abolition shall continue in
   11  service in the full-time judgeship that replaces it for the remainder of
   12  the  term  of  office  to  which he or she was selected in the abolished
   13  judgeship.
   14    S 4. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
   15  have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01973-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act, in relation to the city court judges of the city of Saratoga Springs and to repeal certain provisions of the judiciary law relating thereto
